Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Eagle = Tool.Handle
Tool.Enabled = true
local eagleSound
local vCharacter
local damage = 35
local connection
local eagleClone local count = 0
local torsoFire
local AOE = Vector3.new(10, 10, 10)
local redCliffItems = {"Phoenix Bow", "Phoenix Axe", "PhoenixSword", "PhoenixClub"}
function blow(hit) local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) local myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= nil and humanoid ~= myHumanoid then local rightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if rightArm ~= nil then local joint = rightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if joint ~= nil and (joint.Part0 == Eagle or joint.Part1 == Eagle) then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) if eagleClone then eagleClone:Remove() end wait(1.0) untagHumanoid(humanoid) end end end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil and player ~= nil then local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Parent = humanoid end end
function untagHumanoid(humanoid) if humanoid ~= nil then local tag = humanoid:FindFirstChild("creator") if tag ~= nil then tag:Remove() end end end
function attack() print("Found Damage") if vCharacter then myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:findFirstChild("Torso") if myHumanoid and myHumanoid.Health >= 0 then parts = game.Workspace:FindPartsInRegion3(Region3.new(myTorso.Position - AOE, myTorso.Position + AOE), vCharacter, 100) for i = 1, #parts do tempChar = parts[i].Parent tempHumanoid = tempChar:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if tempHumanoid and count == 0 then print("Found Enemy")
eagleClone = Eagle:Clone() eagleClone.Parent = game.Workspace Eagle.Transparency = 1.0
fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Parent = eagleClone eagleClone.CFrame = CFrame.new(Eagle.Position, tempChar.Head.Position) eagleClone.Velocity = (tempChar.Torso.Position - myTorso.Position).unit * 35.0
local eagleFloat = Instance.new("BodyForce") eagleFloat.force = Vector3.new(0.0, eagleClone:GetMass() * 196.1, 0.0) eagleFloat.Parent = eagleClone
count = 1 eagleClone.Touched:connect(blow) end end end wait(1.0) Eagle.Transparency = 0.0 end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end Tool.Enabled = false
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:findFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then return end
myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if myTorso == nil then return end
eagleSound = Tool:findFirstChild("EagleSound") if eagleSound then eagleSound:Play() end vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) child = vPlayer.Backpack:GetChildren() for i = 1, #child do print(child[i].Name) for j = 1, #redCliffItems do if child[i].Name == redCliffItems[j] then ratio = myHumanoid.Health/myHumanoid.MaxHealth myHumanoid.MaxHealth = 200 myHumanoid.Health = ratio * 200 myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 20 torsoFire = Instance.new("Fire") torsoFire.Heat = 1.0 torsoFire.Size = 1.0 torsoFire.Parent = myTorso end end end healthConnect = myHumanoid.HealthChanged:connect(attack) wait(5.0) if healthConnect then healthConnect:disconnect() end if fire then fire:Remove() end ratio = myHumanoid.Health/myHumanoid.MaxHealth myHumanoid.MaxHealth = 100 myHumanoid.Health = ratio * 100
wait(2.5) Tool.Enabled = true if torsoFire then torsoFire:Remove() end count = 0 end
function onEquipped() end
function onUnequipped() if vCharacter then myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid then ratio = myHumanoid.Health/myHumanoid.MaxHealth myHumanoid.MaxHealth = 100 myHumanoid.Health = ratio * 100 myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end end if connection then connection:disconnect() end if eagleClone then eagleClone:Remove() end
if torsoFire then torsoFire:Remove() end
count = 0 end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
